Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel in superb location!”
Reviews.Author: Jana N
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights solo traveller paid single offered double spacious bags lovely arent fussy hotel desk tv bathroom traditional style hotels location minute walk tube central line 5 minute walk portobello road markets surrounded beautiful houses cafes parks kensington gardens hyde park breakfast included basic toast cereal cafes 1 minute walk highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “No one deserves to stay in this place, no matter how small their budget is”
